name: See Ya Later!
description:
See Ya Later! is an open-ended survival game on a randomly generated world!

Once only available as a KaiOS app, now available on desktop!

After a night of responsible drinking, you end up crashing your ship on the way back to mom's house. Waking up you find parts missing from your ship, you gotta get them back and get back home while surviving hunger, thirst, and the locals!

Features
  • Survive the environment by foraging for food and water to maintain your health.

  • Explore above ground and below ground on a randomly generated maps with different biomes.

  • Craft items that will help you survive and even prosper on this strange foreign planet.

  • Mine precious materials like gold, blue iron, and dirt underground for crafting and building while avoiding the dangers that lurk beneath.

  • Fish to your hearts content. Find some bait, hook, pole, and even bobber and pass the time catching fish.

  • The world is large so use the Cool Spot Recorder to mark places of interest.

  • Find and wear cool clothing.

  • Access the Craftbook for easy recipe reference!

  • Sell and buy items with the locals with their currency KROWZ. Or maybe just grab a KroWKolate bar from a vending machine.
